_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CurseForge (Alpine)
author: contact@chromozone.dev
description: A generic egg for a CurseForge modpack.
startup: java $([ -f user_jvm_args.txt ] && printf %s "@user_jvm_args.txt") -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -Dterminal.jline=false -Dterminal.ansi=true $([ -f unix_args.txt ] && printf %s "@unix_args.txt" || printf %s "-jar $(cat .serverjar)") nogui

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# shellcheck disable=SC2155
#
# CurseForge Installation Script (Alpine Compatible + Java Auto-Install)
# Image: ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:alpine
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

: "${SERVER_DIR:=/mnt/server}"
: "${PROJECT_ID:=}"
: "${VERSION_ID:=}"
: "${API_KEY:=}"

# Garantir que estamos na pasta correta e ela existe
if [ ! -d "$SERVER_DIR" ]; then
    mkdir -p "$SERVER_DIR"
fi

if ! cd "$SERVER_DIR"; then
    echo "Failed to change directory to ${SERVER_DIR}"
    exit 1
fi

install_required() {
    echo "Installing required packages..."
    # Verifica se usa apt (Debian/Ubuntu) ou apk (Alpine)
    if [ -n "$(command -v apt-get)" ]; then
        echo "    Running apt update"
        apt-get update -y > /dev/null 2>&1
        echo "    Running apt install (Tools + Java 21)"
        # Instala ferramentas basicas + Git + Java 21 (Debian names)
        apt-get install -y wget jq unzip findutils git openjdk-21-jre-headless > /dev/null 2>&1
    elif [ -n "$(command -v apk)" ]; then
        echo "    Running apk update"
        apk update > /dev/null 2>&1
        echo "    Running apk add (Tools + Java 21)"
        # Instala ferramentas basicas + Git + Java 21 (Alpine names)
        # O Java é OBRIGATÓRIO para rodar o instalador do NeoForge/Forge
        apk add --no-cache wget jq unzip findutils git openjdk21-jre-headless > /dev/null 2>&1
    else
        echo "Package manager not found. Continuing anyway..."
    fi

    # Verificação de segurança: O Java foi instalado?
    if ! command -v java >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "CRITICAL WARNING: Java was not found after package installation."
        echo "The NeoForge installer requires Java to run."
        echo "Trying fallback to generic openjdk..."
        if [ -n "$(command -v apk)" ]; then apk add --no-cache openjdk21; fi
    fi
}

CURSEFORGE_API_URL="https://api.curseforge.com/v1/mods/"

# Helper para download com headers
download_json() {
    wget -q --header="Accept: application/json" --header="x-api-key: ${API_KEY}" "$1" -O -
}

get_download() {
    echo "Retrieving CurseForge project information..."
    local PROJECT_DATA=$(download_json "${CURSEFORGE_API_URL}${PROJECT_ID}")
    
    if [ -z "${PROJECT_DATA}" ]; then
        echo "    ERROR: Failed to retrieve project data for project id '${PROJECT_ID}'"
        exit 1
    fi

    local PROJECT_TITLE=$(echo "$PROJECT_DATA" | jq -r '.data.name // empty')
    local IS_SERVER_PACK=false

    if [ -z "${VERSION_ID}" ] || [ "${VERSION_ID}" = "latest" ]; then
        echo "    No file ID specified, using latest file"
        VERSION_ID=$(echo "$PROJECT_DATA" | jq -r '.data.mainFileId // empty')

        local VERSION_SERVER_PACK="$(echo "${PROJECT_DATA}" | jq -r --arg VERSION_ID "$VERSION_ID" '.data.latestFiles[] | select(.id|tostring==$VERSION_ID) | .isServerPack')"
        local VERSION_SERVER_ID="$(echo "${PROJECT_DATA}" | jq -r --arg VERSION_ID "$VERSION_ID" '.data.latestFiles[] | select(.id|tostring==$VERSION_ID) | .serverPackFileId')"

        if [ "${VERSION_SERVER_PACK}" = "false" ] && [ -n "${VERSION_SERVER_ID}" ] && [ "${VERSION_SERVER_ID}" != "null" ]; then
            echo "    Found server pack file id '${VERSION_SERVER_ID}'"
            VERSION_ID=$VERSION_SERVER_ID
            IS_SERVER_PACK=true
        elif [ "${VERSION_SERVER_PACK}" = "true" ]; then
            IS_SERVER_PACK=true
        fi
    else
        echo "    Checking if provided file id '${VERSION_ID}' exists"
        local FILE_DATA=$(download_json "${CURSEFORGE_API_URL}${PROJECT_ID}/files/${VERSION_ID}")

        if [ -z "${FILE_DATA}" ]; then
            echo "    ERROR: File id '${VERSION_ID}' not found for project '${PROJECT_TITLE}'"
            exit 1
        fi

        IS_SERVER_PACK=$(echo "${FILE_DATA}" | jq -r '.data.isServerPack // "false"')

        if [ "${IS_SERVER_PACK}" = "false" ]; then
            local VERSION_SERVER_PACK="$(echo "${FILE_DATA}" | jq -r '.data.serverPackFileId // empty')"
            if [ -n "${VERSION_SERVER_PACK}" ] && [ "${VERSION_SERVER_PACK}" != "null" ]; then
                echo "    Found server pack file id '${VERSION_SERVER_PACK}'"
                VERSION_ID=$VERSION_SERVER_PACK
                IS_SERVER_PACK=true
            fi
        else
            IS_SERVER_PACK=true
        fi
    fi

    if [ -z "${VERSION_ID}" ]; then
        echo "    ERROR: No file id found for project '${PROJECT_TITLE}'"
        exit 1
    fi

    if [ "${IS_SERVER_PACK}" = "false" ]; then
        echo "    WARNING: File id '${VERSION_ID}' is not a server pack, attempting to use client files"
    fi

    echo "    Retrieving version information for '${VERSION_ID}'"
    local JSON_DATA=$(download_json "${CURSEFORGE_API_URL}${PROJECT_ID}/files/${VERSION_ID}/download-url")
    local DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo "$JSON_DATA" | jq -r '.data // empty')
    
    if [ -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ] || [ "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" = "null" ]; then
        echo "    ERROR: No download url found for file ${VERSION_ID}"
        exit 1
    fi

    echo "    Downloading ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
    if ! wget -q "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -O server.zip; then
        echo "Download failed!"
        exit 1
    fi
}

get_loader() {
    echo "Retrieving loader information..."
    local FILE_DATA=$(download_json "${CURSEFORGE_API_URL}${PROJECT_ID}/files/${VERSION_ID}")
    local IS_SERVER_PACK=$(echo "${FILE_DATA}" | jq -r '.data.isServerPack // "false"')
    local CLIENT_VERSION_ID

    if [ "${IS_SERVER_PACK}" = "true" ]; then
        CLIENT_VERSION_ID="$(echo "${FILE_DATA}" | jq -r '.data.parentProjectFileId // empty')"
    else
        CLIENT_VERSION_ID=$VERSION_ID
    fi

    if [ -z "${CLIENT_VERSION_ID}" ] || [ "${CLIENT_VERSION_ID}" = "null" ]; then
        CLIENT_VERSION_ID=$VERSION_ID
    fi

    echo "    Retrieving file information for '${CLIENT_VERSION_ID}'"
    local JSON_DATA=$(download_json "${CURSEFORGE_API_URL}${PROJECT_ID}/files/${CLIENT_VERSION_ID}/download-url")
    local DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo "$JSON_DATA" | jq -r '.data // empty')

    if [ -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
        echo "    ERROR: No download url found for client file id ${CLIENT_VERSION_ID}"
        exit 1
    fi

    echo "    Downloading Client Zip for Manifest info..."
    wget -q "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -O client.zip

    echo "    Unpacking client manifest"
    if ! unzip -jo client.zip manifest.json -d "${SERVER_DIR}"; then
         echo "ERROR: Failed to extract manifest.json from client.zip"
         exit 1
    fi
    
    mv "${SERVER_DIR}/manifest.json" "${SERVER_DIR}/client.manifest.json"
    rm -rf client.zip

    echo "    Parsing client manifest"
    local MANIFEST="${SERVER_DIR}/client.manifest.json"

    if grep -q "neoforge" "${MANIFEST}"; then
        echo "    Detected NeoForge in manifest string."
        LOADER_NAME="neoforge"
    fi

    LOADER_ID=$(jq -r '.minecraft.modLoaders[]? | select(.primary == true) | .id' "${MANIFEST}")
    
    if [ -z "$LOADER_NAME" ]; then
        LOADER_NAME=$(echo "${LOADER_ID}" | cut -d'-' -f1)
    fi
    
    LOADER_VERSION=$(echo "${LOADER_ID}" | cut -d'-' -f2)
    MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(jq -r '.minecraft.version // empty' "${MANIFEST}")

    if [ -z "${LOADER_NAME}" ] || [ -z "${LOADER_VERSION}" ]; then
        echo "    ERROR: No loader found in client manifest!"
        exit 1
    fi

    echo "    Found loader ${LOADER_NAME} ${LOADER_VERSION} for Minecraft ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
}

unzip_strip() {
    local archive=$1
    local destdir=${2:-}
    echo "    Unpacking ${archive} to ${destdir}"

    local tmpdir=/mnt/server/tmp
    mkdir -p "${tmpdir}"
    trap 'rm -rf "${tmpdir}"' EXIT

    if ! unzip -q "$archive" -d "$tmpdir"; then
        echo "    ERROR: unzip failed"
        return 1
    fi

    local count=$(ls -1 "$tmpdir" | wc -l)
    local first=$(ls -1 "$tmpdir" | head -n 1)

    if [ -z "$destdir" ]; then
        destdir=./
    fi

    if [ "$count" -eq 1 ] && [ -d "$tmpdir/$first" ]; then
        cp -a "$tmpdir/$first/." "$destdir/" 2>/dev/null
    else
        cp -a "$tmpdir/." "$destdir/" 2>/dev/null
    fi
    rm -rf "$tmpdir"
}

unpack_zip() {
    echo "Unpacking server files..."
    unzip_strip server.zip "${SERVER_DIR}"
    rm -rf server.zip
}

json_download_mods() {
    echo "Downloading mods..."
    local MANIFEST="${SERVER_DIR}/manifest.json"
    if [ ! -f "$MANIFEST" ]; then
        echo "Manifest not found at $MANIFEST, skipping mod download."
        return
    fi

    jq -c '.files[]? | select(.required == true) | {project: .projectID, file: .fileID}' "${MANIFEST}" | while read -r mod; do
        local MOD_PROJECT_ID=$(echo "${mod}" | jq -r '.project // empty')
        local MOD_FILE_ID=$(echo "${mod}" | jq -r '.file // empty')

        if [ -n "${MOD_PROJECT_ID}" ] && [ -n "${MOD_FILE_ID}" ]; then
            local FILE_URL=$(download_json "${CURSEFORGE_API_URL}${MOD_PROJECT_ID}/files/${MOD_FILE_ID}/download-url" | jq -r '.data // empty')
            if [ -n "${FILE_URL}" ] && [ "${FILE_URL}" != "null" ]; then
                echo "    Downloading Mod: ${MOD_PROJECT_ID}..."
                wget -q "${FILE_URL}" -P "${SERVER_DIR}/mods"
            fi
        fi
    done
}

json_download_overrides() {
    echo "Copying overrides..."
    if [ -d "${SERVER_DIR}/overrides" ]; then
        cp -r "${SERVER_DIR}/overrides/"* "${SERVER_DIR}"
        rm -rf "${SERVER_DIR}/overrides"
    fi
}

FORGE_INSTALLER_URL="https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/"

json_download_forge() {
    echo "Downloading Forge..."
    local MC_VERSION=$MINECRAFT_VERSION
    local FORGE_VERSION=$LOADER_VERSION
    local F_FULL="${MC_VERSION}-${FORGE_VERSION}"
    if [ "${MC_VERSION}" = "1.7.10" ] || [ "${MC_VERSION}" = "1.8.9" ]; then
        F_FULL="${F_FULL}-${MC_VERSION}"
    fi

    local FORGE_URL="${FORGE_INSTALLER_URL}${F_FULL}/forge-${F_FULL}-installer.jar"
    echo "    Downloading Installer from ${FORGE_URL}"

    if ! wget -q -O forge-installer.jar "${FORGE_URL}"; then
        echo "    ERROR: Failed to download Forge Installer."
        exit 1
    fi
    
    rm -rf libraries/net/minecraftforge/forge/
    
    echo "    Installing Forge..."
    # Sem > /dev/null para ver erros
    java -jar forge-installer.jar --installServer
    rm -f forge-installer.jar

    local ARGS_FILE=$(find libraries -name "unix_args.txt" 2>/dev/null | head -n 1)

    if [ -n "$ARGS_FILE" ]; then 
         echo "Modern Forge detected (unix_args found at $ARGS_FILE)."
         ln -sf "$ARGS_FILE" unix_args.txt
         echo "server.jar" > .serverjar
    else
         echo "Legacy Forge detected (Jar)."
         if [ -f "forge-${F_FULL}.jar" ]; then
             mv "forge-${F_FULL}.jar" server.jar
         elif [ -f "forge-${F_FULL}-universal.jar" ]; then
             mv "forge-${F_FULL}-universal.jar" server.jar
         fi
         
         echo "server.jar" > ".serverjar"
         rm -f unix_args.txt
    fi
}

FABRIC_INSTALLER_URL="https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/installer"

json_download_fabric() {
    echo "Downloading Fabric..."
    local INSTALLER_JSON=$(wget -q -O - ${FABRIC_INSTALLER_URL})
    local INSTALLER_URL=$(echo "$INSTALLER_JSON" | jq -r '.[0].url // empty')

    wget -q -O fabric-installer.jar "${INSTALLER_URL}"
    java -jar fabric-installer.jar server -mcversion "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" -loader "${LOADER_VERSION}" -downloadMinecraft
    
    echo "fabric-server-launch.jar" > ".serverjar"
    rm -f unix_args.txt
    rm -f fabric-installer.jar
}

QUILT_INSTALLER_URL="https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/installer"

json_download_quilt() {
    echo "Downloading Quilt..."
    local INSTALLER_JSON=$(wget -q -O - ${QUILT_INSTALLER_URL})
    local INSTALLER_URL=$(echo "$INSTALLER_JSON" | jq -r '.[0].url // empty')

    wget -q -O quilt-installer.jar "${INSTALLER_URL}"
    java -jar quilt-installer.jar install server "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" "${LOADER_VERSION}" --download-server --install-dir=./
    
    echo "quilt-server-launch.jar" > ".serverjar"
    rm -f unix_args.txt
    rm quilt-installer.jar
}

NEOFORGE_INSTALLER_URL="https://maven.neoforged.net/releases"

json_download_neoforge() {
    echo "Downloading NeoForge..."
    local NEO_URL="${NEOFORGE_INSTALLER_URL}/net/neoforged/neoforge/${LOADER_VERSION}/neoforge-${LOADER_VERSION}-installer.jar"

    echo "    URL: ${NEO_URL}"
    wget -q -O neoforge-installer.jar "${NEO_URL}"
    
    rm -rf libraries/net/neoforged/neoforge
    
    echo "    Installing NeoForge (Logging enabled)..."
    # Se falhar aqui, veremos o erro, mas agora o Java deve existir.
    if ! java -jar neoforge-installer.jar --installServer; then
        echo "    ERROR: NeoForge installer failed!" 
        # Tenta listar para debug se falhar
        echo "    Debug: Current Dir Content:"
        ls -la
    fi
    
    rm -f neoforge-installer.jar
    
    # Procura segura pelo unix_args
    if [ -d "libraries" ]; then
        local ARGS_FILE=$(find libraries -name "unix_args.txt" 2>/dev/null | head -n 1)
        
        if [ -n "$ARGS_FILE" ]; then
             echo "NeoForge setup: Linking $ARGS_FILE"
             ln -sf "$ARGS_FILE" unix_args.txt
        else
             echo "WARNING: libraries folder exists but unix_args.txt not found!"
        fi
    else
        echo "CRITICAL ERROR: 'libraries' folder was NOT created. The installer failed."
    fi
    
    # Garante o arquivo .serverjar para evitar erro do Startup
    echo "server.jar" > .serverjar
}

# --- EXECUCAO ---

install_required

if [ -z "${PROJECT_ID}" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: PROJECT_ID not set!"
    exit 1
fi

if [ "${PROJECT_ID}" != "zip" ]; then
    get_download
fi

get_loader
unpack_zip

if [ -f "${SERVER_DIR}/manifest.json" ]; then
    echo "Found manifest.json, installing mods..."
    json_download_mods
    json_download_overrides
fi

if [ -n "$LOADER_NAME" ]; then
    if [ "$LOADER_NAME" = "forge" ]; then
        json_download_forge
    elif [ "$LOADER_NAME" = "fabric" ]; then
        json_download_fabric
    elif [ "$LOADER_NAME" = "quilt" ]; then
        json_download_quilt
    elif [ "$LOADER_NAME" = "neoforge" ]; then
        json_download_neoforge
    fi
fi

echo "eula=true" > eula.txt
echo ""
echo "Install completed successfully!"

variables.name: Modpack Project ID
variables.description:
The modpack project ID from the CurseForge site on the pack page, or 'zip' if installing from an uploaded server.zip file.

For example, the project Id of https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/bofa-mods ID is 375152

variables.name: Modpack File ID
variables.description:
The file ID belonging to a specific version of a modpack. Can either be the main file or the file ID associated with the server pack.

If not provided the script will attempt to retrieve the latest server pack or client pack available.

variables.name: CurseForge API Key
variables.description: A CurseForge API key is required to use this egg. You can learn how to get an API key here: https://support.curseforge.com/en/support/solutions/articles/9000208346-about-the-curseforge-api-and-how-to-apply-for-a-key
